Testing DIM and Arrays
======================

Test 1: 1D Array
  A(0) = 10 
  A(2) = 30 
  A(5) = 60 
  PASS: 1D array works

Test 2: 2D Array
  B(0,0) = 1 
  B(1,1) = 5 
  B(2,2) = 9 
  B(3,0) = 13 
  PASS: 2D array works

Test 3: String Array
  C$(0) =RED
  C$(2) =BLUE
  PASS: String array works

Test 4: Array with FOR loop
  D(0) = 0 
  D(2) = 20 
  D(4) = 40 
  PASS: FOR loop with array works

All array tests complete!
